    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">The electromagnetic spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das elektromagnetische Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le spectre électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O spectrum eletromagnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo spettro elettromagnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ηλεκτρομαγνητικό φάσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El espectro electromágnetico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows different types of waves in  the electromagnetic spectrum according to their frequencies and wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">frequencies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gamma rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Microwaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">X-rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt unterschiedliche Typen der 
Wellen im elektromagnetischen Spektrum entsprechend ihren Frequenzen 
und Wellenlängen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre différents types de vagues 
dans le spectre électromagnétique selon leurs fréquences et 
longueurs d'onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra tipos diferentes de ondas no 
spectrum eletromagnético de acordo com seus freqüências e 
wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra i tipi differenti di onde 
nello spettro elettromagnetico secondo le loro frequenze e lunghezze 
d'onda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει διαφορετικούς τύπους 
κυμάτων στο ηλεκτρομαγνητικό φάσμα σύμφωνα με τις συχνότητες και 
τα μήκη κύματός τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra diversos tipos de ondas en 
el espectro electromágnetico según sus frecuencias y longitudes de 
onda.</string>
          </description>
